description: [EXOTIC LILY](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1011) conducted an e-mail thread-hijacking campaign with malicious ISO attachments.(Citation: Google EXOTIC LILY March 2022)(Citation: Proofpoint Bumblebee April 2022)
